title: Corrosion: Understanding the Basics c2000 Davis (ASM)
description:
Corrosion: Understanding the Basics (c2000), edited by Joseph R. Davis (ASM International).

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://www.asminternational.org/materials-resources/results/-/journal_content/56/10192/06691G/PUBLICATION" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.asminternational.org/materials-resources/results/-/journal_content/56/10192/06691G/PUBLICATION</a>
(ISBN-13: 9780871706416 print)

BRIEF CONTENTS:
--------------
1. Introduction to Fatigue and Fracture
2. Mechanical Behavior
3. Ductile and Brittle Fracture
4. Fracture Mechanics
5. Fatigue of Metals
6. Fatigue and Fracture of Engineering Alloys
7. Metallic Joints- Mechanically Fastened and Welded
8. Fracture Control and Damage Tolerance Analysis
9. Fatigue and Fracture of Ceramics and Polymers
10. Fatigue and Fracture of Continuous Fiber Polymer Matrix Composites
11. High Temperature Failures
12. Wear Failures
13. Environmentally-Induced Failures
14. The Failure Analysis Process
APPENDIX: Defects Leading to Failure
(detailed contents at website above)

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF (with average quality rasters).
